attributes.additional_details: It's 2020. We banned using animals at the circus as it was considered a form of cruelty.  It's now time to move away from barbarism of noisy fireworks
attributes.background:
They are a threat to wildlife, domestic animals are air pollutants and cause fear to some children,  especially autistic children. 
We watch in awe at Sir D Attenborough's attempts to care for our environment and then bombard our wildlife with petrifying noise
